incidents.name: [RBX3][Infrastructure] - Room R41- R43 - R46 Incident Notification

incident_updates.body: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : The affected servers are being brought back online gradually, fewer than 1% remain offline. Ongoing Actions : The team is currently working to restore the remaining servers. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : The impacted servers are being brought back online progressively. Ongoing Actions : The team is currently working to restore the remaining servers. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : We had a new electrical cut on the rooms R41- R43 and R46, major part of servers are now operational again. Ongoing Actions : Our team is working to fix remaining servers. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Infrastructure offering, which is causing temporary issue in Room R41- R43 - R46 in RBX3. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 14/08/2025 08:19 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Multiple Racks located in Room R41- R43 and R46 were unavailable. Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access their servers or Service located in Room R41- R43 and R46. Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified. Most of the racks and services are operational again our team is working on the remaining racks. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Infrastructure offer. Start time : 14/08/2025 08:19 UTC Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [APAC][Backbone] - Network instabilities between SGP and SYD

incident_updates.body: We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Backbone offer in SGP and SYD regions. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 14/08/2025 03:32 UTC Impacted Service(s) : There is a latency increase between SGP and SYD backbone infrastructure. Customers Impact : Some customers in the SGP and SYD regions may experience latency issues. Root Cause : This incident is caused by an issue on our provider side. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA1][Network] - Rooms G108 / G118 vRack Private Network

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our vRack Private Network in the rooms G108 and G118. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 21/08/2025 00:00 UTC End time : 21/08/2025 04:00 UTC Service impact : vRack network will be temporarily unavailable. The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration.
